justification: Proposal ignores B’s conservative, possession-WR preference and injury-buy-low tendency. It mislabels Josh Robinson (Tier 5) as a “stud” and calls Brandon Hernandez/Ben King “consistent” despite deep-threat volatility and a declining RB role with tough playoff matchups. While the swap could fit B’s WR need, the rationale lacks specifics on schedule, roles, or rankings B trusts. Feasible but weak ToM and thin justification.
